long_description: With a comfortable back panel and a handy hydration sleeve, the Mountain Hardwear Fluid 12 Pack keeps you hiking fast. It sits close to your back for stability, yet offers great ventilation. Breathable, perforated-foam back panel with air channels offers great breathability to help keep you cool and dry. HardWave framesheet keeps the back panel flat for a stable fit without reducing flexibility. Soft-edged shoulder straps with ventilated foam are comfortable against bare skin. Zippered hydration sleeve holds a reservoir (not included) and makes it easy to refill for convenient hydration on the go. Zippered pocket on top is easily accessible for snacks and other small items. Zippered mesh pockets on hipbelt keep energy bars or other essentials handy; stretch-woven side pockets hold water bottles, gloves and hats. The Mountain Hardwear Fluid 12 Pack is made of 100- and 315-denier ripstop Cordura(R) nylon. Closeout.
short_description: With a comfortable back panel and a handy hydration sleeve, the Mountain Hardwear Fluid 12 Pack keeps you hiking fast. It sits close to your back for stability, yet offers great ventilation.
